actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: To provide for the designation of the Guam and Western Pacific USDA Rural Development office as the representative of USDA Rural Development in Guam, the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, American Samoa, and the Freely Associated States.
short_title: Designating the Guam and Western Pacific USDA Rural Development Office Act

titles.title: Designating the Guam and Western Pacific USDA Rural Development Office Act
Designating the Guam and Western Pacific USDA Rural Development Office Act

To provide for the designation of the Guam and Western Pacific USDA Rural Development office as the representative of USDA Rural Development in Guam, the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, American Samoa, and the Freely Associated States.
